replies.body: So your booting your computer up with windows 98? im so confused why..
replies.body_tagged: So your booting your computer up with windows 98? im so confused why..

replies.body: It's not like that lol. What it is, is using a Virtual Machine, I am running the Operating System in my computer. In the VM I make a virtual hard drive so the OS detects that as a real hard drive and use it. When it says its formatting stuff... Its formatting absolutely nothing. And it takes ages...
replies.body_tagged: It's not like that lol. What it is, is using a Virtual Machine, I am running the Operating System in my computer. In the VM I make a virtual hard drive so the OS detects that as a real hard drive and use it. When it says its formatting stuff... Its formatting absolutely nothing. And it takes ages...

replies.body:
Wow, I can't believe I didn't post anything here yet. Butt anyway, my favorite OS was xp without a doubt.

I still used my old XP computer until like 2011 because I didn't know anything about computers and the only thing that computer could run was:

Stepmania 3.9
Visual Boy Advanced
Microsoft Word (At times it would actually crash)

XP=Windows 7
Vista=Windows 8
